snippet: The success of News Corporation’s cable and entertainment assets has shielded its print properties from a downturn, but now journalists at those publications worry about their future in a separate company.
abstract: Employees at News Corporation's many print newspapers are facing a tougher future following the announcement that the company will be split into two entities; success of News Corporation's cable and entertainment assets has long shielded its print properties from the harsh realities of the contracting newspaper industry, where job reductions and other cutbacks have become common.
lead_paragraph: The success of News Corporation’s cable and entertainment assets has shielded its print properties from a downturn, but now journalists at those publications worry about their future in a separate company.

headline.seo: News Corp. Split Puts New Pressure on Papers
headline.main: News Corp. Split Adds to Pressure on Papers
headline.print_headline: News Corp. Split Adds To Pressure On Papers
